WorkItem.ClosedComment: No further response from user and no way to investigate as we have no Mac devs.
WorkItem.Description:
Rawr gets freeze whenever I try to open a saved XML character file (I wait enough long, about 10 mins, to make sure it is actually dead). I tried both the web and offline version.
 
Silverlight 4.0.60129, Mac OS X 10.6.7, Safari 5.0.4
 
By the way, open a saved upgrade gear XML file is fine, so maybe is not a permission issue.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Freeze when opening character file in Mac OS X

Comments.Message: You forgot to attach the character file.
This is how to reproduce the problem: import from rawr addon (this is my only way to import a character, since I'm in the TW realm), save it as XML, reopen Rawr and open it, and Rawr freeze...
PS, I can open the same file on Windows 7 without any problem, so it may be a platform-dependent issue.
I don't think anyone here develops on a non-windows OS, so I don't know how we can troubleshoot this.
You can't actually develop on mac (I think), you have to set up remote debugging. http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc903948(v=vs.95).aspx
Opening the file I don't see anything immediately wrong with it and it opens fine in my version. Are you able to load from the armory, save a new file and then reopen it?
I can open a character file imported from armory with no problem. I have attached the XML too.
If you try opening from the welcome screen and from the file menu, does it freeze in both cases?
